values.text: Sure, which language do you want me to translate to?

values: Which date would be best for you? We need 24 hours notice for an appointment, the earliest would be tomorrow.
Unfortunately that's a date in the past, please enter a future date.
Unfortunately our bankers aren't available on Sundays.
Unfortunately we can't set up an appointment for today, we need 24 hours notice to make an appointment with one of our bankers.
Unfortunately that's a holiday and our bankers aren't available.
I have detected more than one date in your answer. Please only enter a date you'd prefer. For example, March 30th, rather than Friday March 30th.
Great, <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime('EEE, MMM d, yyyy') ?>.

output.text: How would you describe your current credit level?

values: What time would you like to meet with our banker?
It looks like you mentioned <? @sys-time.reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>. Unfortunately our bankers are only available after 7am and before 7pm.
Okay, <? @sys-time.reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>.
Let's find your closest branch. What is your zip code?

options.label: Pay the minimum amount due of \$411.78

values: I'm having a problem with your zip code. Please keep in mind zip codes are 5 digits long.
Okay, zip code $app_zip.
I'm having a problem with your zip code. Please keep in mind zip codes are 5 digits long.
I'm having some trouble understanding the time you've mentioned. To provide a time simply enter it with an am/pm indicator, or in 24 hour time. For example, 2:30pm, or 14:30.
Which Language?
What is your phone number, including country code? EG: 1-832-734-5835
What are the last 4 digits of the card that you'd like to submit a payment for?

generic.title: The balance for your card ending in $cc_chosen is \$2,058.89. It is due on $bill_due_date. When would you like to submit a payment?

values: I'm sorry to hear your card has been damaged.
Great!
If your card is expiring soon, you will receive a replacement in the mail one week before the expiry date. If your card has expired you will need to talk to one of our Customer Service agents.
We're almost there! We have cash rewards, travel miles or rewards points. Which of these do you prefer?
You can apply for one of our great credit cards on the Credit Cards page.
We have a great range of Savings Accounts to help you get started saving for your dream, simply apply on our Savings Accounts page.
I can help you find a credit card to suit your needs. We have credit cards to build credit, provide rewards, and help you save money. What are you looking for most in a credit card?

notification_display.DisplayText: Watson classifies the feature the user is most interested in and narrows down the possible results.

values: Great! Here is the Low Rate Travel credit card best suited to your needs.

notification_display.DisplayText: Watson provides the ideal card option(s) using the information from the conversation.

values: Hello!

dialog_nodes.title: Checks If Rewards Type Mentioned At Start Excluding Cash Rewards

values: I'm having some trouble understanding the time you've mentioned. To provide a time simply enter it with an am/pm indicator, or in 24 hour time. For example, 2:30pm, or 14:30.

notification_display.DisplayText: This virtual assistant is only trained on specific information regarding booking an appointment, so it may not understand questions out of scope.

values: I can help you schedule an appointment

notification_display.DisplayText: The bot is using slots to gather information on the user. Check out this video to learn more about slots.

values: Unfortunately in situations like this you can only receive a replacement card by talking to one of our Live Agents.
Here is the Low Interest credit card best suited to your needs!

notification_display.DisplayText: Watson provides the ideal card option(s) using the information from the conversation.

values: Not sure? We have a wide range of credit cards and it can be helpful to have someone to take you through the features suited to your situation.

We have an appointment available at our @branchLocation location for <? $app_date.reformatDateTime('EEE, MMM d') ?>, at <? $app_time.reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>. In a few words, can you tell me what is the purpose of the appointment?
Unfortunately I can't help you close an account. You will need to speak to a 94729873749632 Customer Service Agent.
Not sure? If you're looking for a card just to save, you should know cards with rewards systems may have a slightly higher annual fee. Are you interested in rewards?
The only rewards features we have on our credit cards are cash rewards, travel miles or rewards points.
You can visit our Credit Card pages for more information on eligibility criteria and Terms and Conditions.

dialog_nodes.title: Conversation Flow Control - Return To Start

values: Unfortunately to complete the credit card payment process we need this information.
The only rewards features we have on our credit cards are cash rewards, travel miles or rewards points.
You can change your credit limit by going to your Account Settings. You can also speak to one of our Customer Service Agents.
Unfortunately I can't help you with  credit card billing disputes. You will need to talk to a 94729873749632 Customer Service Agent to assist you.

dialog_nodes.title: Store The Purpose Of The Appointment

values.text: One moment while I confirm your appointment.

values: You can easily set up payment reminders from your Account Settings.  Simply log in to your 94729873749632 account, then go to your Settings section and select the notification suited to your needs.
Unfortunately to complete making an appointment, we need this information.
94729873749632 personnel are available for appointments Monday - Saturday, 7am - 7pm.
Are you interested in rewards?

notification_display.DisplayText: Watson continues to refine the possible card options by collecting more information.

values: Some of our credit cards have associated fees and charges. To find out more, simply visit our Fees and Charges page.

values.text: Okay your appointment is confirmed. Here is your reminder.
"You have an appointment on $app_dayofweek, $app_date at $app_time at our @branchLocation location. The purpose of your appointment - $app_purpose."
Is there anything else I can help you with today?

values: I'm not sure what you mean. You may benefit from talking to a 94729873749632 Customer Service agent.
Depending on the type of account you have, you may be charged for late payments. To find out more information about fees, please go to the product page on our website.
Unfortunately to complete the credit card selection process we need this information.
Sure, we can go back a step.
94729873749632 business hours differ for our offices and our Service Center. How would you like to contact us, via a phone call, or visit our office?

values.text: At this time, I can only help you with these credit card features. Please select one.

values: Unfortunately to complete the billing dispute process we need this information.

At this time, I only have cards to help improve credit scores, provide rewards for customers, and help you save money.
